full_summary:
# W6898-240694 - Training Area Cemetery Landscape Maintenance Services - CFB Gagetown

## Description

Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, Real Property Operations Unit (Atlantic), is seeking a Service Contract for the maintenance of cemeteries at the CFB Gagetown training area. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing all necessary labor, materials, tools, supervision, and equipment to cut grass at all cemeteries within the training area.

## Contract Term

The contract term is from issuance of contract to April 30, 2025, with two optional periods of one year each. The contractor will be responsible for maintaining the cemeteries during this period.

## Delivery Location

The services will be delivered at the CFB Gagetown training area, located in New Brunswick, Canada.

## Tender Information

* Tender Number: WS4523375040
* Amendment Number: 2
* Publication Date: April 8, 2024
* Closing Date for Tenders: April 25, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. (ETS)
* Amendment Date: April 24, 2024

## Procurement Information

* Solicitation Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Variations or combinations of the above methods
* Trade Agreements: Various Free Trade Agreements

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
* Chantal Blanchard, Public Services and Procurement Canada
* Email: [chantal.blanchard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:chantal.blanchard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Address:
  * 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
  * Gatineau, Quebec
  * K1A 0S5
